Brookhaven.Northlake, Georgia: Northlake is an unincorporated community in northeastern metro Atlanta, Georgia, United States. Although not formally an edge city, Northlake is home to a large amount of office space, retail options, and residential housing. Similar to its edge city neighbor north of Atlanta, Perimeter Center, Northlake's history began with the construction of a shopping mall, Northlake Mall, in 1971.
